content: The full Insect Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. You can craft the pieces once you defeat Fuban at the end of the secret Kingdom of Sahali area. Our video guide below will take you through how to unlock the area, which requires the Arhat Gold Piece, a Jade Lotus, and the Sobering Stone.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Insect_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Insect Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Insect Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge. You can craft the pieces once you defeat Fuban at the end of the secret Kingdom of Sahali area. Our video guide below will take you through how to unlock the area, which requires the Arhat Gold Piece, a Jade Lotus, and the Sobering Stone.
